meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the November 13, 2024 City Council Meeting and November 19, 2024 Special Called City Council Meeting

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Code of Ethics
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 12A, 'Code of Ethics,' of the Dallas City Code by amending Sections 12A-2, 12A-29, 12A-46, 12A-47, and 12A-48; establishing the Office of the Inspector General; providing a saving clause; providing a severability clause; and providing an effective date.

agenda_items.title: Transfers and Appropriation Adjustments
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32861, previously approved on September 18, 2024, authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2024-25 for the maintenance and operation of various departments.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Abandonment Regulations
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32863, previously approved on September 18, 2024 to add regulations regarding abandonment of public rights-of-way.

agenda_items.title: Rescission of CDBG Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 22-0984, previously authorized on June 22, 2022 authorizing the rescission of the Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Contract.

agenda_items.title: Cooperative Purchasing Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing service price agreement for litigation and pre-litigation support.

agenda_items.title: Supplemental Agreement for Legal Representation
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the professional services contract for continued legal representation.

agenda_items.title: Issuance of Certificates of Obligation
agenda_items.description: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas, Combination Tax and Revenue Certificates of Obligation.

agenda_items.title: Grant Application for Internet Crimes Against Children
agenda_items.description: Authorize the application for and acceptance of supplemental funding from the U.S. Department of Justice for the Internet Crimes Against Children Grant.

agenda_items.title: Cooperative Working Agreements
agenda_items.description: Authorize cooperative working agreements through the Internet Crimes Against Children Grant.

financial_items.description: Transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2024-25
Funding for litigation and pre-litigation support
Supplemental funding for Internet Crimes Against Children Grant
Issuance of Combination Tax and Revenue Certificates of Obligation
